name: market for heat transport fluid system, solar thermal parabolic trough, 50 MW | heat transport fluid system, solar thermal parabolic trough, 50 MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17886/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'heat transport fluid system, solar thermal parabolic trough, 50 MW', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a heat transport fluid system, solar thermal parabolic trough, 50 MW. The infrastructure represents a plant with a lifetime of 30 years.  Its production includes all materials necessary to construct it and their decommission.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
